JobTitle: Industry Solutions Architect - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: As a Solutions Architect you will be a leader through collaborating, developing, reviewing and implementing program specific technical strategies and solutions led by you with our healthcare and life science customers and account teams.  You will gather requirements to help define a “To-Be” state / solution for your Customer. You will work closely with the Account Sales Reps, Pre-Sales Solutions Engineers and members of Leadership team in developing complex and transformational technical strategies & solutions.In the Solutions Architect role, you will use Systems Engineering / Architecture skills, knowledge of VMware’s and other Commercial Cloud solutions (e.g., AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform), and knowledge of Healthcare IT Enterprise requirements to provide a program tailored technical solution. Building a solution may include activities such as executing workshops, conducting client interviews, secondary research, guidance from the Account Team, working with specialists, and product managers.In the Solutions Architect role, you will be acting as a lead technologist and expected to have a broad understanding of technology.
